content: Love the point about how for some teams, just being in the playoffs is good enough. Does Steve Ballmer want the Clippers to win a championship? Of course. But in the mean time, a perennial top 6 team in the West is significantly more profitable than the Clippers have ever been. For smaller market teams, being an 8 seed could make the difference between having to relocate, or making enough money to stay. As a Bucks fan, I don’t demand a championship, I just want them to do well enough to be able to afford to stay around.
